frontmatter.title: Simple charts
frontmatter.description: Simple charts offer a way to visualize data sets in an intuitive, easy to understand way

internal.content:
--- title: Simple charts description: Simple charts offer a way to visualize data sets in an intuitive, easy to understand way --- Simple charts offer a way to visualize data sets in an intuitive, easy to understand way. Every chart should tell a story and should reflect the content on the page where it is found. import { simpleChartDemoGroups } from '../../../data/data-visualization'; import { AnchorLinks, AnchorLink } from 'gatsby-theme-carbon'; import ChartDemoGroup from '../../../components/data-visualization/ChartDemoGroup.js'; {simpleChartDemoGroups.map((storybookDemoGroup) => ( {storybookDemoGroup.title} ))} ## Resources
{simpleChartDemoGroups.map((demoGroup) => ( ))}
